name: Global uniques
uniques: [+10]% [Production] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Industry] tiles>
[+10]% [Gold] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Commerce] tiles>
[+10]% [Happiness] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Residential] tiles>
[+10]% [Culture] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Cultural] tiles>
[+10]% [{Culture}{Happiness}] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Historical] tiles>
[+10]% [{Culture}{Happiness}{Gold}] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Entertainment] tiles>
[+10]% [{Production}{Happiness}] from every [All] <in tiles adjacent to [Transport] tiles>
